articles.description: The glitches are being faced by customers for the past three to five days. The bank had upgraded its system last week.

articles.title: Apollo pharmacy products will soon be available on Amazon - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Online pharmacy is becoming a fiercely competitive space as Reliance recently bought NetMeds and Tata Digital acquired 1mg. Amazon's partnership with an offline large player will heat up the space even more.
articles.content:

articles.author: ET Spotlight Special
articles.title: Top Ethereum killers that investors need to look out for in 2022 - Economic Times
articles.description: Scalability is a major issue for Ethereum. The inherent Proof-of-Work mechanism became dated as the demand for ecosystem usage grew, and it can now only handle 13 transactions per second.
